BadRequest.description: Bad Request. The request was invalid and cannot be completed. See the response body for specific validation errors. This will typically be an issue with the query parameters or their values.

Conflict.description: Conflict.  The request cannot be completed because it would result in an invalid state.  See the response body for details.

Created.description: The resource was created.  An ETag value is available in the ETag header, and the location of the resource is available in the Location header of the response.

Error.description: An unhandled error occurred on the server. See the response body for details.

Forbidden.description: Forbidden. The request cannot be completed in the current authorization context. Contact your administrator if you believe this operation should be allowed.

NotFound.description: The resource could not be found.

NotFoundUseSnapshot.description: The resource could not be found. If Use-Snapshot header is set to true, this response can indicate the snapshot may have been removed.

NotModified.description: The resource's current server-side ETag value matched the If-None-Match header value supplied with the request indicating the resource has not been modified.

PreconditionFailed.description: The resource's current server-side ETag value does not match the supplied If-Match header value in the request. This indicates the resource has been modified by another consumer.

Unauthorized.description: Unauthorized. The request requires authentication. The OAuth bearer token was either not provided or is invalid. The operation may succeed once authentication has been successfully completed.

Updated.description: The resource was updated.  An updated ETag value is available in the ETag header of the response.

EdFi_AcademicWeek.description: This entity represents the academic weeks for a school year, optionally captured to support analyses.

beginDate.description: The start date for the academic week.

endDate.description: The end date for the academic week.

totalInstructionalDays.description: The total instructional days during the academic week.

weekIdentifier.description: The school label for the week.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school. It must be distinct from any other identifier assigned to educational organizations, such as a LocalEducationAgencyId, to prevent duplication.

weekIdentifier.description: The school label for the week.

EdFi_AccountabilityRating.description: An accountability rating for a school or district.

rating.description: An accountability rating level, designation, or assessment.

ratingDate.description: The date the rating was awarded.

ratingOrganization.description: The organization that assessed the rating.

ratingProgram.description: The program associated with the accountability rating (e.g., NCLB, AEIS).

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

EdFi_Assessment.description: This entity represents a tool, instrument, process, or exhibition composed of a systematic sampling of behavior for measuring a student's competence, knowledge, skills, or behavior. An assessment can be used to measure differences in individuals or groups and changes in performance from one occasion to the next.

adaptiveAssessment.description: Indicates that the assessment is adaptive.

assessmentCategoryDescriptor.description: The category of an assessment based on format and content.

assessmentFamily.description: The assessment family this assessment is a member of.

assessmentForm.description: Identifies the form of the assessment, for example a regular versus makeup form, multiple choice versus constructed response, etc.

assessmentIdentifier.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to an assessment.

assessmentTitle.description: The title or name of the assessment.

assessmentVersion.description: The version identifier for the assessment.

author.description: The person or organization chiefly responsible for the intellectual content of the standard.

beginDate.description: The beginning of the period during which this learning standard document is intended for use.

endDate.description: The end of the period during which this learning standard document is intended for use.

publicationDate.description: The date on which this content was first published.

publicationStatusDescriptor.description: The publication status of the document (i.e., Adopted, Draft, Published, Deprecated, Unknown).

publicationYear.description: The year at which this content was first published.

title.description: The name of the content standard, for example Common Core.

uri.description: An unambiguous reference to the standards using a network-resolvable URI.

version.description: The version identifier for the content.

assessmentIdentificationSystemDescriptor.description: A coding scheme that is used for identification and record-keeping purposes by schools, social services, or other agencies to refer to an assessment.

assigningOrganizationIdentificationCode.description: The organization code or name assigning the assessment identification code.

identificationCode.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to an assessment by a school, school system, state, or other agency or entity.

maxRawScore.description: The maximum raw score achievable across all assessment items that are correct and scored at the maximum.

nomenclature.description: Reflects the specific nomenclature used for assessment.

assessmentReportingMethodDescriptor.description: The method that the instructor of the class uses to report the performance and achievement of all students. It may be a qualitative method such as individualized teacher comments or a quantitative method such as a letter or numerical grade. In some cases, more than one type of reporting method may be used.

maximumScore.description: The maximum score to make the indicated level of performance.

minimumScore.description: The minimum score required to make the indicated level of performance.

performanceLevelDescriptor.description: The performance level(s) defined for the assessment.

performanceLevelIndicatorName.description: The name of the indicator being measured for a collection of performance level values.

resultDatatypeTypeDescriptor.description: The datatype of the result. The results can be expressed as a number, percentile, range, level, etc.

assessmentPeriodDescriptor.description: The period of time in which an assessment is supposed to be administered (e.g., Beginning of Year, Middle of Year, End of Year).

beginDate.description: The first date the assessment is to be administered.

endDate.description: The last date the assessment is to be administered.

revisionDate.description: The month, day, and year that the conceptual design for the assessment was most recently revised substantially.

assessmentReportingMethodDescriptor.description: The method that the administrator of the assessment uses to report the performance and achievement of all students. It may be a qualitative method such as performance level descriptors or a quantitative method such as a numerical grade or cut score. More than one type of reporting method may be used.

maximumScore.description: The maximum score possible on the assessment.

minimumScore.description: The minimum score possible on the assessment.

resultDatatypeTypeDescriptor.description: The datatype of the result. The results can be expressed as a number, percentile, range, level, etc.

EdFi_AssessmentItem.description: This entity represents one of many single measures that make up an assessment.

assessmentItemCategoryDescriptor.description: Category or type of the assessment item.

assessmentItemURI.description: The URI (typical a URL) pointing to the entry in an assessment item bank, which describes this content item.

expectedTimeAssessed.description: The duration of time allotted for the assessment item.

identificationCode.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to a space, room, site, building, individual, organization, program, or institution by a school, school system, state, or other agency or entity.

maxRawScore.description: The maximum raw score achievable across all assessment items that are correct and scored at the maximum.

nomenclature.description: Reflects the specific nomenclature used for assessment item.

responseDescription.description: Additional text provided to define the response value.

responseValue.description: The response value, often an option number or code value (e.g., 1, 2, A, B, true, false).

assessmentIdentifier.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to an assessment.

identificationCode.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to a space, room, site, building, individual, organization, program, or institution by a school, school system, state, or other agency or entity.

EdFi_AssessmentScoreRangeLearningStandar.description: Score ranges of an assessment associated with one or more learning standards.

assessmentReportingMethodDescriptor.description: The assessment reporting method defined (e.g., scale score, RIT scale score) associated with the referenced learning standard(s).

maximumScore.description: The maximum score in the score range.

minimumScore.description: The minimum score in the score range.

scoreRangeId.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to the score range associated with one or more learning standards.

assessmentIdentifier.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to an assessment.

scoreRangeId.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to the score range associated with one or more learning standards.

assessmentIdentifier.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to an assessment.

EdFi_BalanceSheetDimension.description: The NCES balance sheet accounting dimension, used to track financial transactions for each fund. These financial statements only report assets, deferred outflows of resources, liabilities, deferred inflows of resources, and equity accounts. The statements are considered snapshots of how these accounts stand as of a certain point in time.

code.description: The code representation of the account balance sheet dimension.

codeName.description: A description of the account balance sheet dimension.

fiscalYear.description: The fiscal year for which the account balance sheet dimension is valid.

code.description: The code representation of the account balance sheet dimension.

fiscalYear.description: The fiscal year for which the account balance sheet dimension is valid.

EdFi_BellSchedule.description: This entity represents the schedule of class period meeting times.

alternateDayName.description: An alternate name for the day (e.g., Red, Blue).

bellScheduleName.description: Name or title of the bell schedule.

date.description: The dates for which the bell schedule applies.

endTime.description: An indication of the time of day the bell schedule ends.

startTime.description: An indication of the time of day the bell schedule begins.

totalInstructionalTime.description: The total instructional time in minutes per day for the bell schedule.

bellScheduleName.description: Name or title of the bell schedule.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school. It must be distinct from any other identifier assigned to educational organizations, such as a LocalEducationAgencyId, to prevent duplication.

EdFi_Calendar.description: A set of dates associated with an organization.

EdFi_CalendarDate.description: The type of scheduled or unscheduled event for the day.

date.description: The month, day, and year of the calendar event.
The month, day, and year of the calendar event.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school. It must be distinct from any other identifier assigned to educational organizations, such as a LocalEducationAgencyId, to prevent duplication.

EdFi_ChartOfAccount.description: A valid combination of account dimensions under which financials are reported. This financial entity represents a funding source combined with its purpose and type of transaction. It provides a formal record of the debits and credits relating to the specific account.

accountIdentifier.description: SEA populated code value for the valid combination of account dimensions under which financials are reported.

accountName.description: A descriptive name for the account.

accountTypeDescriptor.description: The type of account used in accounting such as revenue, expenditure, or balance sheet.

fiscalYear.description: The fiscal year for the account

reportingTagDescriptor.description: A descriptor used at the dimension and/or chart of account levels to demote specific state needs for reporting.

tagValue.description: The value associated with the reporting tag.

accountIdentifier.description: SEA populated code value for the valid combination of account dimensions under which financials are reported.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

fiscalYear.description: The fiscal year for the account

EdFi_ClassPeriod.description: This entity represents the designation of a regularly scheduled series of class meetings at designated times and days of the week.

classPeriodName.description: An indication of the portion of a typical daily session in which students receive instruction in a specified subject (e.g., morning, sixth period, block period, or AB schedules).

endTime.description: An indication of the time of day the meeting time ends.

startTime.description: An indication of the time of day the meeting time begins.

officialAttendancePeriod.description: Indicator of whether this class period is used for official daily attendance. Alternatively, official daily attendance may be tied to a section.

classPeriodName.description: An indication of the portion of a typical daily session in which students receive instruction in a specified subject (e.g., morning, sixth period, block period, or AB schedules).

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school. It must be distinct from any other identifier assigned to educational organizations, such as a LocalEducationAgencyId, to prevent duplication.

EdFi_Cohort.description: This entity represents any type of list of designated students for tracking, analysis, or intervention.

academicSubjectDescriptor.description: The academic subject associated with an academic intervention.

cohortDescription.description: The description of the cohort and its purpose.

cohortIdentifier.description: The name or ID for the cohort.

cohortScopeDescriptor.description: The scope of cohort (e.g., school, district, classroom).

cohortTypeDescriptor.description: The type of cohort (e.g., academic intervention, classroom breakout).

cohortIdentifier.description: The name or ID for the cohort.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

EdFi_CommunityOrganization.description: This entity represents an administrative unit at the state level which exists primarily to operate local community providers.

addressTypeDescriptor.description: The type of address listed for an individual or organization.    For example:  Physical Address, Mailing Address, Home Address, etc.)

apartmentRoomSuiteNumber.description: The apartment, room, or suite number of an address.

buildingSiteNumber.description: The number of the building on the site, if more than one building shares the same address.

city.description: The name of the city in which an address is located.

congressionalDistrict.description: The congressional district in which an address is located.

countyFIPSCode.description: The Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) numeric code for the county issued by the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST). Counties are considered to be the "first-order subdivisions" of each State and statistically equivalent entity, regardless of their local designations (county, parish, borough, etc.) Counties in different States will have the same code. A unique county number is created when combined with the 2-digit FIPS State Code.

doNotPublishIndicator.description: An indication that the address should not be published.

latitude.description: The geographic latitude of the physical address.

localeDescriptor.description: A general geographic indicator that categorizes U.S. territory (e.g., City, Suburban).

longitude.description: The geographic longitude of the physical address.

nameOfCounty.description: The name of the county, parish, borough, or comparable unit (within a state) in which an address is located.

endDate.description: The month, day, and year for the end of the period.

postalCode.description: The five or nine digit zip code or overseas postal code portion of an address.

stateAbbreviationDescriptor.description: The abbreviation for the state (within the United States) or outlying area in which an address is located.

streetNumberName.description: The street number and street name or post office box number of an address.

communityOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to a community organization. It must be distinct from any other identifier assigned to educational organizations, such as a LocalEducationAgencyId, to prevent duplication.

EdFi_Course.description: This educational entity represents the organization of subject matter and related learning experiences provided for the instruction of students on a regular or systematic basis.

careerPathwayDescriptor.description: Indicates the career cluster or pathway the course is associated with as part of a CTE curriculum.

courseCode.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a course.

courseDefinedByDescriptor.description: Specifies whether the course was defined by the SEA, LEA, School, or national organization.

courseDescription.description: A description of the content standards and goals covered in the course. Reference may be made to state or national content standards.

courseGPAApplicabilityDescriptor.description: An indicator of whether or not the course being described is included in the computation of the student's grade point average, and if so, if it is weighted differently from regular courses.

courseTitle.description: The descriptive name given to a course of study offered in a school or other institution or organization. In departmentalized classes at the elementary, secondary, and postsecondary levels (and for staff development activities), this refers to the name by which a course is identified (e.g., American History, English III). For elementary and other non-departmentalized classes, it refers to any portion of the instruction for which a grade or report is assigned (e.g., reading, composition, spelling, and language arts).

dateCourseAdopted.description: Date the course was adopted by the education agency.

highSchoolCourseRequirement.description: An indication that this course may satisfy high school graduation requirements in the course's subject area.

assigningOrganizationIdentificationCode.description: The organization code or name assigning the Identification Code.

courseCatalogURL.description: The URL for the course catalog that defines the course identification code.

courseIdentificationSystemDescriptor.description: A system that is used to identify the organization of subject matter and related learning experiences provided for the instruction of students.

identificationCode.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to a course by a school, school system, state, or other agency or entity. For multi-part course codes, concatenate the parts separated by a "/". For example, consider the following SCED code-    subject = 20 Math    course = 272 Geometry    level = G General    credits = 1.00   course sequence 1 of 1- would be entered as 20/272/G/1.00/1 of 1.

maxCompletionsForCredit.description: Designates how many times the course may be taken with credit received by the student.

maximumAvailableCreditConversion.description: Conversion factor that when multiplied by the number of credits is equivalent to Carnegie units.

maximumAvailableCreditTypeDescriptor.description: The type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

maximumAvailableCredits.description: The value of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

minimumAvailableCreditConversion.description: Conversion factor that when multiplied by the number of credits is equivalent to Carnegie units.

minimumAvailableCreditTypeDescriptor.description: The type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

minimumAvailableCredits.description: The value of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

numberOfParts.description: The number of parts identified for a course.

timeRequiredForCompletion.description: The actual or estimated number of clock minutes required for class completion. This number is especially important for career and technical education classes and may represent (in minutes) the clock hour requirement of the class.

EdFi_CourseOffering.description: This entity represents an entry in the course catalog of available courses offered by the school during a session.

instructionalTimePlanned.description: The planned total number of clock minutes of instruction for this course offering. Generally, this should be at least as many minutes as is required for completion by the related state- or district-defined course.

localCourseCode.description: The local code assigned by the School that identifies the course offering provided for the instruction of students.

localCourseTitle.description: The descriptive name given to a course of study offered in the school, if different from the course title.

localCourseCode.description: The local code assigned by the School that identifies the course offering provided for the instruction of students.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school. It must be distinct from any other identifier assigned to educational organizations, such as a LocalEducationAgencyId, to prevent duplication.

sessionName.description: The identifier for the calendar for the academic session.

EdFi_CourseTranscript.description: This entity is the final record of a student's performance in their courses at the end of a semester or school year.

assigningOrganizationIdentificationCode.description: The organization code or name assigning the Identification Code.

courseCatalogURL.description: The URL for the course catalog that defines the course identification code.

courseIdentificationSystemDescriptor.description: A system that is used to identify the organization of subject matter and related learning experiences provided for the instruction of students.

identificationCode.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to a course by a school, school system, state, or other agency or entity. For multi-part course codes, concatenate the parts separated by a "/". For example, consider the following SCED code-    subject = 20 Math    course = 272 Geometry    level = G General    credits = 1.00   course sequence 1 of 1- would be entered as 20/272/G/1.00/1 of 1.

alternativeCourseTitle.description: The descriptive name given to a course of study offered in the school, if different from the CourseTitle.

assigningOrganizationIdentificationCode.description: The organization code or name assigning the course identification code.

attemptedCreditConversion.description: Conversion factor that when multiplied by the number of credits is equivalent to Carnegie units.

attemptedCreditTypeDescriptor.description: The type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

attemptedCredits.description: The value of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

courseAttemptResultDescriptor.description: The result from the student's attempt to take the course.

courseCatalogURL.description: The URL for the course catalog that defines the course identification code.

courseRepeatCodeDescriptor.description: Indicates that an academic course has been repeated by a student and how that repeat is to be computed in the student's academic grade average.

courseTitle.description: The descriptive name given to a course of study offered in a school or other institution or organization. In departmentalized classes at the elementary, secondary, and postsecondary levels (and for staff development activities), this refers to the name by which a course is identified (e.g., American History, English III). For elementary and other non-departmentalized classes, it refers to any portion of the instruction for which a grade or report is assigned (e.g., reading, composition, spelling, language arts).

additionalCreditTypeDescriptor.description: The type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

credits.description: The value of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course

earnedCreditConversion.description: Conversion factor that when multiplied by the number of credits is equivalent to Carnegie units.

earnedCreditTypeDescriptor.description: The type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

earnedCredits.description: The value of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

externalEducationOrganizationNameOfInsti.description: Name of the external institution where the student completed the course; to be used only when the reference external education organization is not available.

finalLetterGradeEarned.description: The final indicator of student performance in a class as submitted by the instructor.

finalNumericGradeEarned.description: The final indicator of student performance in a class as submitted by the instructor.

methodCreditEarnedDescriptor.description: The method the credits were earned.

awardDate.description: The date the partial credits and/or grades were awarded or earned.

earnedCredits.description: The number of credits a student earned for completing a given course.

letterGradeEarned.description: The indicator of student performance as submitted by the instructor.

methodCreditEarnedDescriptor.description: The method the credits were earned.

numericGradeEarned.description: The indicator of student performance as submitted by the instructor.

whenTakenGradeLevelDescriptor.description: Student's grade level at time of course.

courseAttemptResultDescriptor.description: The result from the student's attempt to take the course.

courseCode.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a course.

courseEducationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

studentUniqueId.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a student.

termDescriptor.description: The term for the session during the school year.

courseCode.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a course.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

EdFi_Credential.description: The legal document giving authorization to perform teaching assignment services.

credentialFieldDescriptor.description: The field of certification for the certificate (e.g., Mathematics, Music).

credentialIdentifier.description: Identifier or serial number assigned to the credential.

credentialTypeDescriptor.description: An indication of the category of credential an individual holds.

effectiveDate.description: The year, month and day on which an active credential held by an individual was issued.

endorsement.description: Endorsements are attachments to teaching certificates and indicate areas of specialization.

expirationDate.description: The month, day, and year on which an active credential held by an individual will expire.

issuanceDate.description: The month, day, and year on which an active credential was issued to an individual.

stateOfIssueStateAbbreviationDescriptor.description: The abbreviation for the name of the state (within the United States) or extra-state jurisdiction in which a license/credential was issued.

teachingCredentialBasisDescriptor.description: An indication of the pre-determined criteria for granting the teaching credential that an individual holds.

teachingCredentialDescriptor.description: An indication of the category of a legal document giving authorization to perform teaching assignment services.

credentialIdentifier.description: Identifier or serial number assigned to the credential.

stateOfIssueStateAbbreviationDescriptor.description: The abbreviation for the name of the state (within the United States) or extra-state jurisdiction in which a license/credential was issued.

EdFi_CrisisEvent.description: A natural or man-made event that causes the disruption of school-level activities and the temporary or permanent displacement of students.

crisisDescription.description: Provides a textual description of the crisis event affecting the student. It may include details such as the nature of the crisis (e.g., natural disaster, conflict, medical emergency), its severity, location, and any other relevant information describing the crisis situation.

crisisEndDate.description: The date on which the crisis ceased to affect the student.

crisisEventName.description: The name of the crisis event that occurred. If there is no generally accepted name for this crisis event, the suggested format: Location + Crisis type + Year.

crisisStartDate.description: The year, month and day on which the crisis affected the student. This date may not be the same as the date the crisis occurred if evacuation orders are implemented in anticipation of a crisis.

crisisTypeDescriptor.description: The type or category of crisis.

crisisEventName.description: The name of the crisis event that occurred. If there is no generally accepted name for this crisis event, the suggested format: Location + Crisis type + Year.

EdFi_DescriptorMapping.description: A mapping of a descriptor value in one namespace to a descriptor value in another namespace. This can be used to exchange known contextual mappings of enumeration values.

mappedNamespace.description: The namespace of the descriptor value to which the from descriptor value is mapped to.

mappedValue.description: The descriptor value to which the from descriptor value is being mapped to.

namespace.description: The namespace of the descriptor value that is being mapped to another value.

value.description: The descriptor value that is being mapped to another value.

mappedNamespace.description: The namespace of the descriptor value to which the from descriptor value is mapped to.

mappedValue.description: The descriptor value to which the from descriptor value is being mapped to.

namespace.description: The namespace of the descriptor value that is being mapped to another value.

value.description: The descriptor value that is being mapped to another value.

EdFi_DisciplineAction.description: This event entity represents actions taken by an education organization after a disruptive event that is recorded as a discipline incident.

actualDisciplineActionLength.description: Indicates the actual length in school days of a student's disciplinary assignment.

disciplineActionIdentifier.description: Identifier assigned by the education organization to the discipline action.

disciplineActionLength.description: The length of time in school days for the discipline action (e.g. removal, detention), if applicable.

disciplineActionLengthDifferenceReasonDe.description: Indicates the reason for the difference, if any, between the official and actual lengths of a student's disciplinary assignment.

disciplineDate.description: The date of the discipline action.

iepPlacementMeetingIndicator.description: An indication as to whether an offense and/or disciplinary action resulted in a meeting of a student's Individualized Education Program (IEP) team to determine appropriate placement.

relatedToZeroTolerancePolicy.description: An indication of whether or not this disciplinary action taken against a student was imposed as a consequence of state or local zero tolerance policies.

disciplineActionIdentifier.description: Identifier assigned by the education organization to the discipline action.

disciplineDate.description: The date of the discipline action.

studentUniqueId.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a student.

EdFi_DisciplineIncident.description: This event entity represents an occurrence of an infraction ranging from a minor behavioral problem that disrupts the orderly functioning of a school or classroom (such as tardiness) to a criminal act that results in the involvement of a law enforcement official (such as robbery). A single event (e.g., a fight) is one incident regardless of how many perpetrators or victims are involved. Discipline incidents are events classified as warranting discipline action.

behaviorDescriptor.description: Describes behavior by category and provides a detailed description.

behaviorDetailedDescription.description: Specifies a more granular level of detail of a behavior involved in the incident.

caseNumber.description: The case number assigned to the DisciplineIncident by law enforcement or other organization.

disciplineIncidentParticipationCodeDescr.description: The role or type of participation of an individual in the discipline incident.

firstName.description: A name given to an individual at birth, baptism, or during another naming ceremony, or through legal change.

lastSurname.description: The name borne in common by members of a family.

incidentCost.description: The value of any quantifiable monetary loss directly resulting from the discipline incident. Examples include the value of repairs necessitated by vandalism of a school facility, or the value of personnel resources used for repairs or consumed by the incident.

incidentDate.description: The month, day, and year on which the discipline incident occurred.

incidentIdentifier.description: A locally assigned unique identifier (within the school or school district) to identify each specific DisciplineIncident or occurrence. The same identifier should be used to document the entire discipline incident even if it included multiple offenses and multiple offenders.

incidentLocationDescriptor.description: Identifies where the discipline incident occurred and whether or not it occurred on school.

incidentTime.description: An indication of the time of day the incident took place.

reportedToLawEnforcement.description: Indicator of whether the incident was reported to law enforcement.

reporterDescriptionDescriptor.description: Information on the type of individual who reported the discipline incident. When known and/or if useful, use a more specific option code (e.g., "Counselor" rather than "Professional Staff").

reporterName.description: Identifies the reporter of the discipline incident by name.

incidentIdentifier.description: A locally assigned unique identifier (within the school or school district) to identify each specific DisciplineIncident or occurrence. The same identifier should be used to document the entire discipline incident even if it included multiple offenses and multiple offenders.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school. It must be distinct from any other identifier assigned to educational organizations, such as a LocalEducationAgencyId, to prevent duplication.

EdFi_EducationContent.description: This entity represents materials for students or teachers that can be used for teaching, learning, research, and more. Education content includes full courses, course materials, modules, intervention descriptions, textbooks, streaming videos, tests, software, and any other tools, materials, or techniques used to support access to knowledge.

additionalAuthorsIndicator.description: Indicates whether there are additional un-named authors. In a research report, this is often marked by the abbreviation "et al".

author.description: The individual credited with the creation of the resource.

contentClassDescriptor.description: The predominate type or kind characterizing the learning resource.

contentIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the education content.

cost.description: An amount that has to be paid or spent to buy or obtain the education content.

costRateDescriptor.description: The rate by which the cost applies.

derivativeSourceLearningResourceMetadata.description: The URI (typical a URL) pointing to the metadata entry in a LRMI metadata repository, which describes this content item.

derivativeSourceURI.description: The URI (typical a URL) pointing to an education content item.

description.description: An extended written representation of the education content.

interactivityStyleDescriptor.description: The predominate mode of learning supported by the learning resource. Acceptable values are active, expositive, or mixed.

learningResourceMetadataURI.description: The URI (typical a URL) pointing to the metadata entry in a LRMI metadata repository, which describes this content item.

publicationDate.description: The date on which this content was first published.

publicationYear.description: The year at which this content was first published.

publisher.description: The organization credited with publishing the resource.

shortDescription.description: A short description or name of the entity.

timeRequired.description: Approximate or typical time it takes to work with or through this learning resource for the typical intended target audience.

useRightsURL.description: The URL where the owner specifies permissions for using the resource.

version.description: The version identifier for the content.

contentIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the education content.

EdFi_EducationOrganization.description: This entity represents any public or private institution, organization, or agency that provides instructional or support services to students or staff at any level.

addressTypeDescriptor.description: The type of address listed for an individual or organization.    For example:  Physical Address, Mailing Address, Home Address, etc.)

apartmentRoomSuiteNumber.description: The apartment, room, or suite number of an address.

buildingSiteNumber.description: The number of the building on the site, if more than one building shares the same address.

city.description: The name of the city in which an address is located.

congressionalDistrict.description: The congressional district in which an address is located.

countyFIPSCode.description: The Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) numeric code for the county issued by the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST). Counties are considered to be the "first-order subdivisions" of each State and statistically equivalent entity, regardless of their local designations (county, parish, borough, etc.) Counties in different States will have the same code. A unique county number is created when combined with the 2-digit FIPS State Code.

doNotPublishIndicator.description: An indication that the address should not be published.

latitude.description: The geographic latitude of the physical address.

localeDescriptor.description: A general geographic indicator that categorizes U.S. territory (e.g., City, Suburban).

longitude.description: The geographic longitude of the physical address.

nameOfCounty.description: The name of the county, parish, borough, or comparable unit (within a state) in which an address is located.

beginDate.description: The month, day, and year for the start of the period.

endDate.description: The month, day, and year for the end of the period.

postalCode.description: The five or nine digit zip code or overseas postal code portion of an address.

stateAbbreviationDescriptor.description: The abbreviation for the state (within the United States) or outlying area in which an address is located.

streetNumberName.description: The street number and street name or post office box number of an address.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

educationOrganizationIdentificationSyste.description: The school system, state, or agency assigning the identification code.

identificationCode.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code that is assigned to an education organization by a school, school system, state, or other agency or entity.

designatedBy.description: The person, organization, or department that defined the metric.

indicatorDescriptor.description: The name or code for the indicator or metric.

indicatorGroupDescriptor.description: The name for a group of indicators.

indicatorLevelDescriptor.description: The value of the indicator or metric, as a value from a controlled vocabulary. The semantics of an empty value is "not submitted."

indicatorValue.description: The value of the indicator or metric. The semantics of an empty value is "not submitted."

beginDate.description: The month, day, and year for the start of the period.

endDate.description: The month, day, and year for the end of the period.

institutionTelephoneNumberTypeDescriptor.description: The type of communication number listed for an individual or organization.

telephoneNumber.description: The telephone number including the area code, and extension, if applicable.

addressLine1.description: The first line of the address.

addressLine2.description: The second line of the address.

addressLine3.description: The third line of the address.

addressLine4.description: The fourth line of the address.

addressTypeDescriptor.description: The type of address listed for an individual or organization. For example:  Physical Address, Mailing Address, Home Address, etc.)

beginDate.description: The first date the address is valid. For physical addresses, the date the individual moved to that address.

countryDescriptor.description: The name of the country. It is strongly recommended that entries use only ISO 3166 2-letter country codes.

endDate.description: The last date the address is valid. For physical addresses, the date the individual moved from that address.

latitude.description: The geographic latitude of the physical address.

longitude.description: The geographic longitude of the physical address.

nameOfInstitution.description: The full, legally accepted name of the institution.

operationalStatusDescriptor.description: The current operational status of the education organization (e.g., active, inactive).

shortNameOfInstitution.description: A short name for the institution.

webSite.description: The public web site address (URL) for the education organization.

EdFi_EducationOrganizationInterventionPr.description: This association indicates interventions made available by an education organization. Often, a district-level education organization purchases a set of intervention prescriptions and makes them available to its schools for use on demand.

beginDate.description: The begin date of the period during which the intervention prescription is available.

endDate.description: The end date of the period during which the intervention prescription is available.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

interventionPrescriptionEducationOrganiz.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

interventionPrescriptionIdentificationCo.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to an intervention prescription.

beginDate.description: The date on which the education organization joined this network.

endDate.description: The date on which the education organization left this network.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

educationOrganizationNetworkId.description: The identifier assigned to a network of education organizations. It must be distinct from any other identifier assigned to educational organizations, such as a LocalEducationAgencyId, to prevent duplication.

EdFi_EvaluationRubricDimension.description: The cells of a rubric, consisting of a qualitative decription, definition, or exemplar with the associated rubric evaluation level.

evaluationCriterionDescription.description: The evaluation criterion description for the evaluation rubric dimension.

evaluationRubricRating.description: The numeric rating associated with the evaluation rubric dimension.

evaluationRubricRatingLevelDescriptor.description: The rating level achieved for the evaluation rubric dimension.

rubricDimensionSortOrder.description: The sort order of the rubric dimension.

evaluationRubricRating.description: The numeric rating associated with the evaluation rubric dimension.

programEducationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

programEvaluationElementTitle.description: The name or title of the program evaluation element.

programEvaluationPeriodDescriptor.description: The name of the period for the program evaluation.

programEvaluationTitle.description: An assigned unique identifier for the student program evaluation.

programEvaluationTypeDescriptor.description: The type of program evaluation conducted.

programName.description: The formal name of the program of instruction, training, services, or benefits available through federal, state, or local agencies.

EdFi_FeederSchoolAssociation.description: The association from feeder school to the receiving school.

beginDate.description: The month, day, and year of the first day of the feeder school association.

endDate.description: The month, day, and year of the last day of the feeder school association.

feederRelationshipDescription.description: Describes the relationship from the feeder school to the receiving school, for example by program emphasis, such as special education, language immersion, science, or performing art.

beginDate.description: The month, day, and year of the first day of the feeder school association.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school. It must be distinct from any other identifier assigned to educational organizations, such as a LocalEducationAgencyId, to prevent duplication.

EdFi_FunctionDimension.description: The NCES function accounting dimension representing an expenditure. The function describes the activity for which a service or material object is acquired. The functions of a school district are generally classified into five broad areas, including instruction, support services, operation of non-instructional services, facilities acquisition and construction, and debt service.

code.description: The code representation of the account function dimension.

codeName.description: A description of the account function dimension.

fiscalYear.description: The fiscal year for which the account function dimension is valid.

code.description: The code representation of the account function dimension.

fiscalYear.description: The fiscal year for which the account function dimension is valid.

EdFi_FundDimension.description: The NCES fund accounting dimension. A fund is a fiscal and accounting entity with a self-balancing set of accounts recording cash and other financial resources, together with all related liabilities and residual equities or balances, and changes therein, which are segregated for the purpose of carrying on specific activities or attaining certain objectives in accordance with special regulations, restrictions, or limitations.

code.description: The code representation of the account fund dimension.

codeName.description: A description of the account fund dimension.

fiscalYear.description: The fiscal year for which the account fund dimension is valid.

code.description: The code representation of the account fund dimension.

fiscalYear.description: The fiscal year for which the account fund dimension is valid.

EdFi_GeneralStudentProgramAssociation.description: This association base class represents the basic relationship between students and programs.

beginDate.description: The earliest date the student is involved with the program. Typically, this is the date the student becomes eligible for the program.

endDate.description: The month, day, and year on which the student exited the program or stopped receiving services.

designatedBy.description: The person, organization, or department that designated the participation status.

statusBeginDate.description: The date the student's program participation status began.

statusEndDate.description: The date the student's program participation status ended.

reasonExitedDescriptor.description: The reason the student left the program within a school or district.

servedOutsideOfRegularSession.description: Indicates whether the student received services during the summer session or between sessions.

beginDate.description: The earliest date the student is involved with the program. Typically, this is the date the student becomes eligible for the program.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

programEducationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

programName.description: The formal name of the program of instruction, training, services, or benefits available through federal, state, or local agencies.

studentUniqueId.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a student.

EdFi_Grade.description: This educational entity represents an overall score or assessment tied to a course over a period of time (i.e., the grading period). Student grades are usually a compilation of marks and other scores.

currentGradeAsOfDate.description: As-Of date for a grade posted as the current grade.

currentGradeIndicator.description: An indicator that the posted grade is an interim grade for the grading period and not the final grade.

diagnosticStatement.description: A statement provided by the teacher that provides information in addition to the grade or assessment score.

gradeEarnedDescription.description: A description of the grade earned by the learner.

gradeTypeDescriptor.description: The type of grade reported (e.g., exam, final, grading period).

diagnosticStatement.description: A statement provided by the teacher that provides information in addition to the grade or assessment score.

letterGradeEarned.description: A final or interim (grading period) indicator of student performance for a learning standard as submitted by the instructor.

numericGradeEarned.description: A final or interim (grading period) indicator of student performance for a learning standard as submitted by the instructor.

performanceBaseConversionDescriptor.description: A performance level that describes the student proficiency.

letterGradeEarned.description: A final or interim (grading period) indicator of student performance in a class as submitted by the instructor.

numericGradeEarned.description: A final or interim (grading period) indicator of student performance in a class as submitted by the instructor.

performanceBaseConversionDescriptor.description: A conversion of the level to a standard set of performance levels.

beginDate.description: Month, day, and year of the student's entry or assignment to the section.

gradeTypeDescriptor.description: The type of grade reported (e.g., exam, final, grading period).

gradingPeriodDescriptor.description: The state's name of the period for which grades are reported.

gradingPeriodName.description: The school's descriptive name of the grading period.

localCourseCode.description: The local code assigned by the School that identifies the course offering provided for the instruction of students.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school. It must be distinct from any other identifier assigned to educational organizations, such as a LocalEducationAgencyId, to prevent duplication.

sectionIdentifier.description: The local identifier assigned to a section.

sessionName.description: The identifier for the calendar for the academic session.

studentUniqueId.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a student.

EdFi_GradebookEntry.description: This entity represents an assignment, homework, or classroom assessment to be recorded in a gradebook.

dateAssigned.description: The date the assignment, homework, or assessment was assigned or executed.

description.description: A description of the assignment, homework, or classroom assessment.

dueDate.description: The date the assignment, homework, or assessment is due.

dueTime.description: The time the assignment, homework, or assessment is due.

gradebookEntryIdentifier.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to a gradebook entry by the source system.

gradebookEntryTypeDescriptor.description: The type of the gradebook entry.

maxPoints.description: The maximum number of points  that can be earned for the submission.

namespace.description: Namespace URI for the source of the gradebook entry.

sourceSectionIdentifier.description: The local identifier assigned to a section.

title.description: The name or title of the activity to be recorded in the gradebook entry.

gradebookEntryIdentifier.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to a gradebook entry by the source system.

namespace.description: Namespace URI for the source of the gradebook entry.

EdFi_GradingPeriod.description: This entity represents the time span for which grades are reported.

beginDate.description: Month, day, and year of the first day of the grading period.

endDate.description: Month, day, and year of the last day of the grading period.

gradingPeriodDescriptor.description: The state's name of the period for which grades are reported.

gradingPeriodName.description: The school's descriptive name of the grading period.

periodSequence.description: The sequential order of this period relative to other periods.

totalInstructionalDays.description: Total days available for educational instruction during the grading period.

gradingPeriodDescriptor.description: The state's name of the period for which grades are reported.

gradingPeriodName.description: The school's descriptive name of the grading period.

schoolId.description: The identifier assigned to a school. It must be distinct from any other identifier assigned to educational organizations, such as a LocalEducationAgencyId, to prevent duplication.

EdFi_GraduationPlan.description: This entity is a plan outlining the required credits, credits by subject, credits by course, and other criteria required for graduation. A graduation plan may be one or more standard plans defined by an education organization and/or individual plans for some or all students.

courseSetName.description: Identifying name given to a collection of courses.

creditConversion.description: Conversion factor that when multiplied by the number of credits is equivalent to Carnegie units.

creditTypeDescriptor.description: The type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

credits.description: The value of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

whenTakenGradeLevelDescriptor.description: The grade level when the student is planned to take the course.

creditCategoryDescriptor.description: A categorization for the course transcript credits awarded in the course transcript.

creditConversion.description: Conversion factor that when multiplied by the number of credits is equivalent to Carnegie units.

creditTypeDescriptor.description: The type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

credits.description: The value of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

academicSubjectDescriptor.description: The intended major subject area of the graduation requirement.

creditConversion.description: Conversion factor that when multiplied by the number of credits is equivalent to Carnegie units.

creditTypeDescriptor.description: The type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

credits.description: The value of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

graduationPlanTypeDescriptor.description: The type of academic plan the student is following for graduation.

individualPlan.description: An indicator of whether the graduation plan is tailored for an individual.

assessmentReportingMethodDescriptor.description: The method that the instructor of the class uses to report the performance and achievement of all students. It may be a qualitative method such as individualized teacher comments or a quantitative method such as a letter or numerical grade. In some cases, more than one type of reporting method may be used.

maximumScore.description: The maximum score to make the indicated level of performance.

minimumScore.description: The minimum score required to make the indicated level of performance.

performanceLevelDescriptor.description: The performance level(s) defined for the assessment.

performanceLevelIndicatorName.description: The name of the indicator being measured for a collection of performance level values.

resultDatatypeTypeDescriptor.description: The datatype of the result. The results can be expressed as a number, percentile, range, level, etc.

assessmentReportingMethodDescriptor.description: The method that the administrator of the assessment uses to report the performance and achievement of all students. It may be a qualitative method such as performance level descriptors or a quantitative method such as a numerical grade or cut score. More than one type of reporting method may be used.

maximumScore.description: The maximum score possible on the assessment.

minimumScore.description: The minimum score possible on the assessment.

resultDatatypeTypeDescriptor.description: The datatype of the result. The results can be expressed as a number, percentile, range, level, etc.

totalRequiredCreditConversion.description: Conversion factor that when multiplied by the number of credits is equivalent to Carnegie units.

totalRequiredCreditTypeDescriptor.description: The type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

totalRequiredCredits.description: The value of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

graduationPlanTypeDescriptor.description: The type of academic plan the student is following for graduation.

EdFi_Intervention.description: An implementation of an instructional approach focusing on the specific techniques and materials used to teach a given subject.

beginDate.description: The start date for the intervention implementation.

deliveryMethodDescriptor.description: The way in which an intervention was implemented.

endDate.description: The end date for the intervention implementation.

interventionClassDescriptor.description: The way in which an intervention is used: curriculum, supplement, or practice.

interventionIdentificationCode.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to an intervention.

learningResourceMetadataURI.description: The URI (typical a URL) pointing to the metadata entry in a LRMI metadata repository, which describes this content item.

maxDosage.description: The maximum duration of time in minutes that may be assigned for the intervention.

endTime.description: An indication of the time of day the meeting time ends.

startTime.description: An indication of the time of day the meeting time begins.

minDosage.description: The minimum duration of time in minutes that may be assigned for the intervention.

uri.description: The URI (typical a URL) pointing to an education content item.

EdFi_InterventionPrescription.description: This entity represents a formal prescription of an instructional approach focusing on the specific techniques and materials used to teach a given subject. This can be prescribed by academic research, an interventions vendor, or another entity.

deliveryMethodDescriptor.description: The way in which an intervention was implemented: individual, small group, whole class, or whole school.

interventionClassDescriptor.description: The way in which an intervention is used: curriculum, supplement, or practice.

interventionPrescriptionIdentificationCo.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to an intervention prescription.

learningResourceMetadataURI.description: The URI (typical a URL) pointing to the metadata entry in a LRMI metadata repository, which describes this content item.

maxDosage.description: The maximum duration of time in minutes that is recommended for the intervention.

minDosage.description: The minimum duration of time in minutes that is recommended for the intervention.

uri.description: The URI (typical a URL) pointing to an education content item.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

interventionPrescriptionIdentificationCo.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to an intervention prescription.

EdFi_InterventionStudy.description: An experimental or quasi-experimental study of an intervention technique.

deliveryMethodDescriptor.description: The way in which an intervention was implemented: individual, small group, whole class, or whole school.

interventionClassDescriptor.description: The way in which an intervention is used: curriculum, supplement, or practice.

diagnosisDescriptor.description: Targeted purpose of the intervention (e.g., attendance issue, dropout risk) for which the effectiveness is measured.

gradeLevelDescriptor.description: Grade level for which effectiveness is measured.

improvementIndex.description: Along a percentile distribution of students, the improvement index represents the change in an average student's percentile rank that is considered to be due to the intervention.

interventionEffectivenessRatingDescripto.description: An intervention demonstrates effectiveness if the research has shown that the program caused an improvement in outcomes. Values: positive effects, potentially positive effects, mixed effects, potentially negative effects, negative effects, and no discernible effects.

populationServedDescriptor.description: Population for which effectiveness is measured.

interventionStudyIdentificationCode.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to an intervention study.

learningResourceMetadataURI.description: The URI (typical a URL) pointing to the metadata entry in a LRMI metadata repository, which describes this content item.

participants.description: The number of participants observed in the study.

uri.description: The URI (typical a URL) pointing to an education content item.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

interventionStudyIdentificationCode.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to an intervention study.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

interventionIdentificationCode.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to an intervention.

EdFi_LearningStandard.description: A statement that describes a specific competency or academic standard.

author.description: The person or organization chiefly responsible for the intellectual content of the standard.

beginDate.description: The beginning of the period during which this learning standard document is intended for use.

endDate.description: The end of the period during which this learning standard document is intended for use.

publicationDate.description: The date on which this content was first published.

publicationStatusDescriptor.description: The publication status of the document (i.e., Adopted, Draft, Published, Deprecated, Unknown).

publicationYear.description: The year at which this content was first published.

title.description: The name of the content standard, for example Common Core.

uri.description: An unambiguous reference to the standards using a network-resolvable URI.

version.description: The version identifier for the content.

courseTitle.description: The official course title with which this learning standard is associated.

description.description: The text of the statement. The textual content that either describes a specific competency such as "Apply the Pythagorean Theorem to determine unknown side lengths in right triangles in real-world and mathematical problems in two and three dimensions." or describes a less granular group of competencies within the taxonomy of the standards document, e.g. "Understand and apply the Pythagorean Theorem," or "Geometry".

contentStandardName.description: The name of the content standard, for example Common Core.

identificationCode.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to a Learning Standard.

learningStandardCategoryDescriptor.description: An additional classification of the type of a specific learning standard.

learningStandardId.description: The identifier for the specific learning standard (e.g., 111.15.3.1.A).

learningStandardItemCode.description: A code designated by the promulgating body to identify the statement, e.g. 1.N.3 (usually not globally unique).

learningStandardScopeDescriptor.description: Signals the scope of usage the standard. Does not necessarily relate the standard to the governing body.

namespace.description: The namespace of the organization or entity who governs the standard. It is recommended the namespaces observe a URI format and begin with a domain name under the governing organization or entity control.

successCriteria.description: One or more statements that describes the criteria used by teachers and students to check for attainment of a learning standard. This criteria gives clear indications as to the degree to which learning is moving through the Zone or Proximal Development toward independent achievement of the learning standard.

uri.description: An unambiguous reference to the statement using a network-resolvable URI.

EdFi_LearningStandardEquivalenceAssociat.description: Indicates a directional association of equivalence from a source to a target learning standard.

effectiveDate.description: The date that the association is considered to be applicable or effective.

learningStandardEquivalenceStrengthDescr.description: Captures supplemental information on the relationship. Recommended for use only when the match is partial.
A measure that indicates the strength or quality of the equivalence relationship.

namespace.description: The namespace of the organization that has created and owns the association.

learningStandardId.description: The identifier for the specific learning standard (e.g., 111.15.3.1.A).

namespace.description: The namespace of the organization that has created and owns the association.

learningStandardId.description: The identifier for the specific learning standard (e.g., 111.15.3.1.A).

EdFi_LocalAccount.description: The set of account codes defined by an education organization for a fiscal year. It provides a formal record of the debits and credits relating to the specific account.

accountIdentifier.description: Code value for the valid combination of account dimensions by LEA under which financials are reported.

accountName.description: A descriptive name for the account.

fiscalYear.description: The fiscal year for the account.

reportingTagDescriptor.description: A descriptor used at the dimension and/or chart of account levels to demote specific state needs for reporting.

tagValue.description: The value associated with the reporting tag.

accountIdentifier.description: Code value for the valid combination of account dimensions by LEA under which financials are reported.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

fiscalYear.description: The fiscal year for the account.

asOfDate.description: The date of the reported amount for the account.

financialCollectionDescriptor.description: The accounting period or grouping for which the amount is collected.

accountIdentifier.description: Code value for the valid combination of account dimensions by LEA under which financials are reported.

asOfDate.description: The date of the reported amount for the account.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

financialCollectionDescriptor.description: The accounting period or grouping for which the amount is collected.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

fiscalYear.description: The fiscal year for the account.

staffUniqueId.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a staff.

EdFi_LocalEducationAgency.description: This entity represents an administrative unit at the local level which exists primarily to operate schools or to contract for educational services. It includes school districts, charter schools, charter management organizations, or other local administrative organizations.

gunFreeSchoolsActReportingStatusDescript.description: An indication of whether the school or Local Education Agency (LEA) submitted a Gun-Free Schools Act (GFSA) of 1994 report to the state, as defined by Title 18, Section 921.

schoolChoiceImplementStatusDescriptor.description: An indication of whether the LEA was able to implement the provisions for public school choice under Title I, Part A, Section 1116 of ESEA as amended.

addressTypeDescriptor.description: The type of address listed for an individual or organization.    For example:  Physical Address, Mailing Address, Home Address, etc.)

apartmentRoomSuiteNumber.description: The apartment, room, or suite number of an address.

buildingSiteNumber.description: The number of the building on the site, if more than one building shares the same address.

city.description: The name of the city in which an address is located.

congressionalDistrict.description: The congressional district in which an address is located.

countyFIPSCode.description: The Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) numeric code for the county issued by the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST). Counties are considered to be the "first-order subdivisions" of each State and statistically equivalent entity, regardless of their local designations (county, parish, borough, etc.) Counties in different States will have the same code. A unique county number is created when combined with the 2-digit FIPS State Code.

doNotPublishIndicator.description: An indication that the address should not be published.

latitude.description: The geographic latitude of the physical address.

localeDescriptor.description: A general geographic indicator that categorizes U.S. territory (e.g., City, Suburban).

longitude.description: The geographic longitude of the physical address.

nameOfCounty.description: The name of the county, parish, borough, or comparable unit (within a state) in which an address is located.

beginDate.description: The month, day, and year for the start of the period.

endDate.description: The month, day, and year for the end of the period.

postalCode.description: The five or nine digit zip code or overseas postal code portion of an address.

stateAbbreviationDescriptor.description: The abbreviation for the state (within the United States) or outlying area in which an address is located.

streetNumberName.description: The street number and street name or post office box number of an address.

charterStatusDescriptor.description: A school or agency providing free public elementary or secondary education to eligible students under a specific charter granted by the state legislature or other appropriate authority and designated by such authority to be a charter school.

fiscalYear.description: The fiscal year for which the federal funds are received.

innovativeDollarsSpent.description: The total Title V, Part A funds expended by LEAs.

innovativeDollarsSpentStrategicPrioritie.description: The total amount of Title V, Part A funds expended by LEAs for the four strategic priorities.

innovativeProgramsFundsReceived.description: The total Title V, Part A funds received by LEAs.

schoolImprovementAllocation.description: The amount of Section 1003(a) and 1003(g) allocations to LEAs.

schoolImprovementReservedFundsPercentage.description: An indication of the percentage of the Title I, Part A allocation that the SEA reserved in accordance with Section 1003(a) of ESEA and 200.100(a) of ED's regulations governing the reservation of funds for school improvement under Section 1003(a) of ESEA.

stateAssessmentAdministrationFunding.description: The percentage of funds used to administer assessments required by Section 1111(b) or to carry out other activities described in Section 6111 and other activities related to ensuring that the state's schools and LEAs are held accountable for results.

supplementalEducationalServicesFundsSpen.description: The dollar amount spent on supplemental educational services during the school year under Title I, Part A, Section 1116 of ESEA as amended.

supplementalEducationalServicesPerPupilE.description: The maximum dollar amount that may be spent per child for expenditures related to supplemental educational services under Title I of the ESEA.

educationOrganizationIdentificationSyste.description: The school system, state, or agency assigning the identification code.

identificationCode.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code that is assigned to an education organization by a school, school system, state, or other agency or entity.

designatedBy.description: The person, organization, or department that defined the metric.

indicatorDescriptor.description: The name or code for the indicator or metric.

indicatorGroupDescriptor.description: The name for a group of indicators.

indicatorLevelDescriptor.description: The value of the indicator or metric, as a value from a controlled vocabulary. The semantics of an empty value is "not submitted."

indicatorValue.description: The value of the indicator or metric. The semantics of an empty value is "not submitted."

beginDate.description: The month, day, and year for the start of the period.

endDate.description: The month, day, and year for the end of the period.

institutionTelephoneNumberTypeDescriptor.description: The type of communication number listed for an individual or organization.

telephoneNumber.description: The telephone number including the area code, and extension, if applicable.

addressLine1.description: The first line of the address.

addressLine2.description: The second line of the address.

addressLine3.description: The third line of the address.

addressLine4.description: The fourth line of the address.

addressTypeDescriptor.description: The type of address listed for an individual or organization. For example:  Physical Address, Mailing Address, Home Address, etc.)

beginDate.description: The first date the address is valid. For physical addresses, the date the individual moved to that address.

countryDescriptor.description: The name of the country. It is strongly recommended that entries use only ISO 3166 2-letter country codes.

endDate.description: The last date the address is valid. For physical addresses, the date the individual moved from that address.

latitude.description: The geographic latitude of the physical address.

longitude.description: The geographic longitude of the physical address.

localEducationAgencyCategoryDescriptor.description: The category of local education agency/district.

localEducationAgencyId.description: The identifier assigned to a local education agency. It must be distinct from any other identifier assigned to educational organizations, such as a SchoolId, to prevent duplication.

nameOfInstitution.description: The full, legally accepted name of the institution.

operationalStatusDescriptor.description: The current operational status of the education organization (e.g., active, inactive).

shortNameOfInstitution.description: A short name for the institution.

webSite.description: The public web site address (URL) for the education organization.

localEducationAgencyId.description: The identifier assigned to a local education agency. It must be distinct from any other identifier assigned to educational organizations, such as a SchoolId, to prevent duplication.

EdFi_LocalEncumbrance.description: The set of local education agency or charter management organization encumbrance amounts.

asOfDate.description: The date of the reported amount for the account.

financialCollectionDescriptor.description: The accounting period or grouping for which the amount is collected.

accountIdentifier.description: Code value for the valid combination of account dimensions by LEA under which financials are reported.

asOfDate.description: The date of the reported amount for the account.

educationOrganizationId.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

fiscalYear.description: The fiscal year for the account.

EdFi_LocalPayroll.description: The set of local education agency or charter management organization payroll amounts.

financialCollectionDescriptor.description: The accounting period or grouping for which the amount is collected.
